feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C17 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 26, 10:00 - 12:00 UTC

Mar 6, 23:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified rack.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 26/03/2025 10:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2025 12:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in rack T06C17.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:
Mar 7, 21:28 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on racks R804R10, R804R11 and R804R12 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/03/2025 19:30 UTC
End time : 07/03/2025 19:56 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Mar 7, 20:08 UTC
Monitoring - We have determined the origin of the incident affected our Dedicated Servers offer on the rack RBX1003B04B.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 07/03/2025 19:30 UTC
End time : 07/03/2025 19:56 UTC
Impacted Service : Some servers were temporarily unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and a fix has been implemented and we continue to monitor the situation.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
